case.title: Does chivalry still exist - 29 (London)
case.text: I'm an attractive, intelligent asian (Indian) girl looking for a man who knows how to treat a lady. Someone who will take me out and treat me well. It would be nice to meet someone for a few dates and see where it heads. I am hoping that a relationship would come out of this. I am only interested in white men (sorry its just a preference) between the ages of 25-40. Please reply with a picture. No picture no response.
